text: K Mahendran () is a young Indian politician and contested as a candidate of Congress party for the post of MLA in Tamil Nadu Assembly Election 2016 from pattukkottai constituency."Rahul’s brigade bags nine seats for TN polls". He is the one of the secretaries of national committee of Indian Youth Congress."IYC National Committee". ==References== Category:Living people Category:Indian National Congress politicians from Tamil Nadu Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: K. Mahendran (IYC)
